scripts.build: npm run bundle && npm run copy-static
scripts.copy-static: cp index.html build/ && cp index.css build/ && cp bundle.js build/
scripts.deploy-init: cd build && git init && git add -A
scripts.deploy-remote: cd build && git remote add origin git@github.com:derekr/dumb-weights-ui.git
scripts.deploy-push: cd build && git push -f origin master:gh-pages
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run deploy-init && npm run deploy-remote && npm run deploy-commit && npm run deploy-push && rm -rf ./build/.git
